page.title: 06SCHOOLS FOR THE HANDICAPPED
page.content: PENNY FIELDS SCHOOL was opened in February 1982. It is a school for the mentally and physically handicapped.There are 10 qualified staff,but there are another 20 teaching assistants. The teacher pupil ratio is 1-6.50 pupils attend this school, the age range is 2 - l9 years. There are special facilities including a heated pool for hydrotherapy.A flat in the Home Economics Room enables the children to learn home skills. The lessons include Home Economics, Art,PE.,Movement, Sensory Experience and Early Communications. Penny Fields school is a bright,cheerful school, with all the latest equipment.
